revised_title: Diffraction by Three Semi-Infinite Planes: A Wiener-Hopf Approach
tldr: This article presents a solution to the scattering of a plane sound wave by three parallel equidistant planes using the Wiener-Hopf technique. The author derives an explicit solution and discusses various properties of the scattered field. The method involves factorizing a matrix and solving the diffraction problem, providing insights into the behavior of sound waves in complex environments.
